snippet: Again, anxiety that the standoff between the West and Russia will hurt Europe’s economic revival pulled down the major stock indexes, though the fears helped the 10-year Treasury note.
abstract: Stock market falls as investors remain concerned about slowing global growth and threat of rising tensions between Russia and the West.
lead_paragraph: Again, anxiety that the standoff between the West and Russia will hurt Europe’s economic revival pulled down the major stock indexes, though the fears helped the 10-year Treasury note.

headline.main: Shares Drift Lower, as Tensions With Russia Cast a Pall on Growth
headline.print_headline: Shares Drift Lower, as Tensions With Russia Cast a Pall on Growth
